aircraft.value: Sparrow Light - AC-6151-362 at Sector North Station

defect_observed.value: Ammunition feed jam. Malfunction reported by flight crew.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Targeting System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 09/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 10/08/2023 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 14/08/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 13/08/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 15/08/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Targeting System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
